collection:
This Privacy
Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of
information through our API when accessed by an AI agent or otherwise.

Information Collection

When you use our API, we may collect the following types of information:

  * User-Provided Information: Information you provide when using the API, which may include personal data.
* Automatically Collected Information: Information automatically collected when using our API, such as usage data, location data, and other technical data.
* AI Agent Data: Information related to the AI agent's interactions with our API.
sharing:
This Privacy
Policy outlines our practices regarding the collection, use, and sharing of
information through our API when accessed by an AI agent or otherwise.

Sharing of Information

We may share the information we collect with third parties, including:

  * Service providers and partners who assist us in operating our API and conducting our business.
